text:
Because of the global scope
that Delivery Hero has,

we also have to comply with
some of the local regulation
like in Europe with the GDPR,
and AWS has allowed us to remain compliant

because the data would
remain within the region,
namely in the world of the observability.

Instead of producing all
these logs and metrics
and traces in their own silo,

we could just combine
this with the full context
and remove those redundancies

and increase the value that
we get out of this data.
The cloud portfolio that we have from AWS
enables us to not just be limited
to certain technical stacks,
but having the options to choose from

and take the right approach
for the right problem to solve.
AWS has been, from our point of view,

a very, very good partner
where we could work with.

And this customer voice, this
customer-centric approach,
is absolutely outstanding.
